Merged:
Ansar, Hekmat, Ghavamin, Mehr Eghtesad, Kosar
These banks have been merged with Sepah
but I kept their logos, just in case.


While nearly all internet companies in Iran need to place bank and gateway logos on their website, no one has access to high quality logos as banks are not interested to share their vector files.

That's why I created this project on 2019 to take away the pain of finding bank logos for designers and developers and now I'm re-publishing it as a community file.

check my Github for other formats:

github.com/zegond
